Shipping

Europe - We have stopped shipping to European countries on this website. To order our products please click here.Free shipping Orders over £35 - 2nd Class Tracked, 2-3 days, (Royal Mail advise it can occasionally take a little longer) Tracking will be sent to mobile / email address provided.2nd Class Tracked & Signed (alcohol and non-alcohol) -£3.49, 2-3 days, (Royal Mail advise it can occasionally take a little longer) Tracking will be sent to mobile / email address provided.1st Class Tracked & Signed (alcohol and non-alcohol) -£4.49, 1-2 days, (Royal Mail advise it can occasionally take a little longer) Tracking will be sent to mobile / email address provided.Parcels over 3kg Tracked & Signed (alcohol and non-alcohol) - £4.50, DHL, 1-2 working days. Tracking will be sent to mobile / email address provided.


Christmas FAQs & Delivery

Check Christmas delivery guidance before ordering. View our Chrismas FAQ page> Best Before Dates:Minimum BBD is 6 monthsStill have a question?View our Ordering Information Page orCONTACT USAs we continue to work from home please address all enquiries to an email address below:For customer enquiries contact: Hello@popaball.co.ukFor trade enquiries contact: Trade@popaball.co.ukFor press enquiries contact: Press@popaball.co.uk
